extensionDescription.message: Export DeepSeek/Doubao chats to Word, PDF, Mind Map, MD & create knowledge cards. Includes controls for single/multiple messages.

cardContentLabel.description: Label for the markdown content textarea.

getApiKeyLink.description: Text for the 'Get API Key' link.

heightOverflowHiddenLabel.description: Label for height overflow hidden toggle.

apiKeyRequiredAlert.description: Alert message when API Key is missing.

noCardContentAlert.description: Alert message when card content is empty.

invalidDimensionsAlert.message: Width and height must be positive numbers.

previewOriginalImageButton.description: Text for the 'Preview Original Image' button.

downloadCardZipText.description: Text for downloading card as ZIP. %s is for page count.

pagesUnit.description: Unit for pages in ZIP download.

zipGeneratedConfirm.message: ZIP file has been generated. Do you want to open the download link in a new tab immediately?

unknownResponseType.description: Error message for unknown API response type.

noValidUrlInApiResponse.message: No valid image or file URL found in API response.
noValidUrlInApiResponse.description: Error message for missing URL in API response.

cannotConnectToServer.description: Error message for server connection failure.

contentExtractionFailed.message: # Content extraction failed\n\nPlease manually copy the content or check the script's DOM selectors.
contentExtractionFailed.description: Fallback message when content extraction fails.

selectConversationsAlert.message: Please select conversations to export first.
selectConversationsAlert.description: Alert when no conversations are selected for export.

failedToExtractContent.message: Failed to extract content from selected conversations.
failedToExtractContent.description: Alert when content extraction for selected items fails.

downloadError.description: Error message for file download issues.

statusCode.description: Part of an error message indicating HTTP status code.

unknownError.description: Part of an error message indicating an unknown error.

cannotParseErrorMessage.description: Error message when the received error message cannot be parsed.

exportMindMapButton.description: Text for the 'Export Mind Map' button.

doubaoAppName.description: Name of the Doubao application for file naming.

failedToExtractOrEmptyContent.message: Failed to extract content from selected conversations or content is empty.
failedToExtractOrEmptyContent.description: Alert when selected content for card generation is empty or extraction fails.
